name: Escape Observation
storyline: You wake up in an endless loop within a mystery room, and you must pay attention to the signals given to you by the changes in each room in order to find the right way out. Some of these changes will be useful and some will be useless. At first, the game will be puzzle orientated, and once you know what to look for, it's up to you to notice it!
summary: ‘Escape Observation’ is a short walking simulator inspired by the game ‘The Exit 8’, where you can only move your character and control your vision. It is important to note that the game is not about finding out if a room has changed, but rather that each room is different and you must be aware of the signals that these changes give you.
